thunderous-two-hand-jam.name: Thunderous Two-Hand Jam
thunderous-two-hand-jam.description: Classic Shaq power dunk - two hands throwing it down with devastating force
thunderous-two-hand-jam.prompt: thunderous two-handed dunk - MASSIVE 7'1" frame elevated, both hands gripping ball and SLAMMING it through rim with devastating force, mouth open in primal scream, veins visible, muscles bulging, pure dominant power

backboard-breaking.name: Breaking the Backboard
backboard-breaking.description: The iconic moment - Shaq hanging on rim as backboard/structure collapses
backboard-breaking.prompt: hanging on basketball rim after destructive dunk - MASSIVE frame weighing down the goal, backboard cracking and structure beginning to collapse, shot clock falling, one hand gripping bent rim, knowing smile of destruction, pure dominance personified

dudley-poster.name: The Dudley Poster
dudley-poster.description: Dunking through a defender then pushing them to the ground - the most disrespectful poster
dudley-poster.prompt: dunking THROUGH a defender with one hand while shoving them backward to the ground with the other - MASSIVE frame overwhelming smaller opponent, ball being thrown down with authority, defender falling away, cold look of disrespect and dominance
dudley-poster.energy: most disrespectful dunk ever, pure intimidation

drop-step-spin.name: Drop Step Spin Move
drop-step-spin.description: Shaq's unstoppable post move - drop step spin into power dunk
drop-step-spin.prompt: executing signature drop step spin move in the post - MASSIVE 7'1" body pivoting with surprising agility, ball protected, about to rise for unstoppable close-range power dunk, focused determined expression

flexing-celebration.name: Flexing Celebration
flexing-celebration.description: Shaq flexing after a dominant play
flexing-celebration.prompt: flexing both arms in celebration after dominant play - MASSIVE muscular frame with biceps bulging, head thrown back roaring in triumph, veins popping, absolute physical specimen showing off superhuman strength

free-throw-fail.name: Free Throw Brick
free-throw-fail.description: Humorous - Shaq shooting a free throw that's clearly going to miss
free-throw-fail.prompt: shooting free throw with awkward form - MASSIVE frame at free throw line, ball releasing with flat trajectory clearly heading for front of rim, face showing concentrated grimace mixed with hope, the one weakness

stare-down.name: Post-Dunk Stare Down
stare-down.description: Standing over opponent after poster dunk, menacing stare
stare-down.prompt: standing over fallen defender after poster dunk - MASSIVE 7'1" 325-pound frame towering, looking down with cold menacing stare, arms slightly spread, daring anyone else to challenge, pure intimidation
